result.purpose: Responsible for managing location-related services, including retrieving location information based on IP addresses and handling configuration.
result.architecture: The folder follows a service-oriented architecture pattern, encapsulating configuration and service logic related to location functionalities.

pkg/location/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structure for the location package.

pkg/location/location_svc.go.purpose: Provides a service for retrieving location information based on IP addresses and downloading a database of IP locations.
